parameters.name: Face1
parameters.description: First IFace2 that defines this two- or three-bend corner

parameters.name: Face2
parameters.description: Second IFace2 that defines this two- or three-bend corner

parameters.name: Face3
parameters.description: Third IFace2 that defines this three-bend corner; valid only if ICornerReliefFeatureData::CornerReliefBendType is swCornerReliefBendType_e .swCornerReliefBendType_ThreeBend; specify null or Nothing for a two-bend corner

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Corner relief type as defined by swCornerReliefType_e

title: ICornerReliefFeatureData.AddNewCorner
description: Adds a corner with the specified parameters to this sheet metal corner relief feature.
signature:
System.Int32 AddNewCorner( 
   System.Object
Face1
,
   System.Object
Face2
,
   System.Object
Face3
,
   System.Int32
ReliefType
,
   out System.Object
Corner
)

parameters.name: Face1
parameters.description: First IFace2 that defines this two- or three-bend corner

parameters.name: Face2
parameters.description: Second IFace2 that defines this two- or three-bend corner

parameters.name: Face3
parameters.description: Third IFace2 that defines this three-bend corner; valid only if ICornerReliefFeatureData::CornerReliefBendType is swCornerReliefBendType_e .swCornerReliefBendType_ThreeBend; specify null or Nothing for a two-bend corner

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Corner relief type as defined by swCornerReliefType_e

returns: Error code as defined by swCornerReliefError_e
